item.title: Rapid and ultrasensitive electrochemical detection of circulating tumor DNA by hybridization on the network of gold-coated magnetic nanoparticles
item.description:

Open Access

Dongfei Chen, Yanfang Wu, Sharmin Hoque, Richard D. Tilley, J. Justin Gooding
